title: Just a suggestion for morg's Q
body:
We all dread being hit by the Mid-Late game certain death move, and i don't like how she is perma-banned in ranked cos i like playing her but i just don't bother anymore cos of that, but my suggestion is make her Q flash-able terrain so instead of a snare it makes a very mini jarvan ult that dissipates if no one gets hit or they escape, the visual effect already looks this way anyway, and maybe it could be like Azir's ult so dashes cant go through it, only blinks so it doesn't piss off too many morg players, and it would still be OP, trading a flash for a Q is a fair trade for her, 
I'm sure this has many problems which no doubt the community will share and I'm sure this has been thought of already but hey its just an idea.

replies.body: and dun let ur team report 4 afk
Or instead of ripping other champions, make it 1.5s instead of 3s.

If you make the duration of the snare less, then she can barely get damage off as it is required to keep them in her pool. No player in their right mind would stay in her pool and it takes 1 second to walk over and avoid. Likewise, nerfing the damage/ap scaling on her q would nearly make her an unviable choice in any other position other than support (which would suck), because once again, her pool is reliant on the q damage (pool does more damage with more missing health). **Morgana's entire kit relies on her landing her snare otherwise she is useless.** Also, it has an 11 second cool down, so realistically she can only go in every 11 seconds, unlike other midlaners like Orianna and Ahri
 
Lux is essentially the same. Her max Q cc is 2 seconds burt all of he spells have lower ap scalings due to her being a burst mage. She doesn't require her snare other than to hold enemies in place for her ult and to make sure that she can actually detonate her passive.
